data.prayer: Father, multiply brothers, sisters, and mothers to our spiritual family in Yamagata, Japan.
data.verse: He replied to him, “Who is my mother, and who are my brothers?” Pointing to his disciples, he said, “Here are my mother and my brothers. For whoever does the will of my Father in heaven is my brother and sister and mother.”

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Yamagata, Japan
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Jesus, please give your people in Yamagata, Japan a passion for the lost.
data.verse: We are therefore Christ’s ambassadors, as though God were making his appeal through us. We implore you on Christ’s behalf: Be reconciled to God.

data.section_summary: On average, 104 babies will be born in the next 100 hours to families who are far from God in Yamagata, Japan.
data.prayer: Jesus, reveal yourself to these new families.
Lord, stir the hearts of your people in the state of Yamagata to agree with you and with one another in love.
data.verse: that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.prayer: Jesus, please give the apostles in Yamagata, Japan a vision for the harvest, and a passion to see the gospel spread to every corner of the the state.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Spirit, I pray that the Eurasian people will come and worship before you, Lord. May they glorify your name for you are great.
Jesus, your return is closer than when we first believed. Please, set urgency in the hearts of the people living in the state of Yamagata.
data.verse: Besides this you know the time, that the hour has come for you to wake from sleep. For salvation is nearer to us now than when we first believed.

data.prayer: Father, thank you that in your kindness you have made every believer in Yamagata, Japan a priest, who can offer spiritual sacrifices to you through Jesus.
data.verse: Therefore I tell you that the kingdom of God will be taken away from you and given to a people who will produce its fruit. He who falls on this stone will be broken to pieces, but he on whom it falls will be crushed.”

data.prayer: Spirit, cause the 6,522 believers in Yamagata to obey with immediate, radical, costly obedience, like Abraham.
data.verse: Then God said, “Take your son, your only son, whom you love — Isaac — and go to the region of Moriah. Sacrifice him there as a burnt offering on a mountain I will show you.” Early the next morning Abraham got up and loaded his donkey. He took with him two of his servants and his son Isaac. When he had cut enough wood for the burnt offering, he set out for the place God had told him about.

location.name: Yamagata
location.people_groups_list: South Asian, Bengali-speaking, Kikai, Judeo-Japanese, Malay, Okinawan, Ryukyuan
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: South Asian, Bengali-speaking (69,000), Kikai (13,000), Judeo-Japanese (50,000), Malay (9,900), Okinawan, Ryukyuan (1,183,000)
